verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:41
verses.text: Therefore Saul said unto the Lord God of Israel, Give a perfect lot. And Saul and Jonathan were taken: but the people escaped.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:42
verses.text: And Saul said, Cast lots between me and Jonathan my son. And Jonathan was taken.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:43
verses.text: Then Saul said to Jonathan, Tell me what thou hast done. And Jonathan told him, and said, I did but taste a little honey with the end of the rod that was in mine hand, and, lo, I must die.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:44
verses.text: And Saul answered, God do so and more also: for thou shalt surely die, Jonathan.
